mapper.select: select -- 회원 정보 u.id, u.user_code, u.nickname, u.email, u.updated_at as created_at, if(u.profile_preview_img is not null, u.profile_preview_img, '') as profile_preview_img from users u where u.id = #{id}

select u.id, u.nickname, u.user_code, ifnull(u.profile_img, '') as profile_img, ifnull(u.profile_preview_img, '') as profile_preview_img from users u left join calendar_groups cg on u.id = cg.user_id where cg.calendar_id = #{id};
